title: Ticket #321: Hibernation doesn't work with older Linux kernels
description: The hibernation code doesn't properly shutdown 2.6.18 kernels (and probably some others, too). I need to research what the proper way to shut these down is, and implement it.
remarks: With the release of 7.4, the Condor administrator will be able to create a hibernation plugin that suits their needs, allowing the hibernation mechanism to work with any system.
